ISSUE.TITLE: [Feature] Edit table without logging in.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Is there a way to share a table so that anyone with a specific link can edit it? Without having to register/login? Thanks.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: accept ftp url Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: add shared base option with editor role re #518 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
